# NSIdentityUsageDescription

**Property List Key**

A message that tells people why the app is requesting identity information.

## Discussion



For more information about requesting identity information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/PassKit/requesting-identity-data-from-a-wallet-pass]. For design guidance, see [https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/technologies/wallet#identity-verification].

## Wallet

- **NSFinancialDataUsageDescription**: A message that tells people why the app is requesting access to financial data stored in Wallet.
